snippet: Philip Montgomery, who has photographed New York City’s Islamic communities, visited mosques during the holy month of Ramadan, which this year is June 28 to July 28.
abstract: Photographer Philip Montgomery has been documenting New York City's various Islamic communities since 2009; he says he has found an incredible diversity of cultures and practices throughout the boroughs.
lead_paragraph: Philip Montgomery, who has photographed New York City’s Islamic communities, visited mosques during the holy month of Ramadan, which this year is June 28 to July 28.

headline.seo: Photographing New York City’s Islamic Communities
